data.text: Pen ñɨn kɨdek anɨb ak, Jisas bɨ takaw nop dad ameb anep umɨgan ak ayɨp, taun okok man sɨkol okok amɨl, God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab takaw teplep ak, binɨb okok kɨlop agñak.

8.2-3 Mat 27.55-56, Mak 15.40-41, 16.9, Luk 23.49 Pen ñɨn anɨb ak, bin tap gak Jisas gek suŋ lak ogɨnap, kɨcheki walɨjpal sek mɨdel ne gek bin yɨbɨl lak ogɨnap, ayɨp ajelɨgɨpal. Bin anɨb okok yɨb kɨli nɨm ak, olap Maliya taun Makdala nɨb apal. Nop kɨcheki anep kugul ak yek, Jisas agek pɨlɨk amnɨlak.

Bin olap Jowana. Nɨgɨmɨl yɨb ak Kusa, ne gapman bɨnonɨm Helod kal tap nop okok kod mɨdolɨgup. Bin olap Susana. Kɨli bin yokɨp ogɨnap ayɨp mani kɨli okok ke dam tap taw dad apɨl, Jisas bɨne okok ayɨp tap jɨmñɨl ñɨbɨlɨg gɨ ajelɨgɨpal.
Binɨb man keke, tun okok tun okok Jisas nop nɨgɨnɨg kɨdek owlak okok, binɨb ned owlak okok, kɨlop takaw olap paladaŋ lɨl agak,

8.5 Mat 13.3, Mak 4.3 Bɨ olap wit jakaŋ agɨl, wit mɨdup ak dam wog day okok yokɨnɨgab agak. Yokek, ogɨnap kanɨb nab ak yapek, binɨb okok taw amɨl apɨl gel, yawl okok pen ap nɨŋɨd mɨdupsek ñɨŋɨnɨgabal agak.
Ogɨnap kab adek lum sɨkol yenɨgab okok yapɨl jakɨnɨgab ak pen, lum mɨlep gaknɨŋ pɨsnep mɨlep gɨnɨgab agak.
Pen ogɨnap nag ñuñu nab okok yapek, nag anɨb okok pak yuwɨg gek, jak tep ma gɨnɨgab agak.
Pen ogɨnap lum teplep okok yapɨl jak tep yɨbɨl gɨl, mɨdup kuŋay yɨbɨl nep pulɨnɨgab agak.
Anɨb agek, bɨne okok nop agnɨŋɨd agɨlak, Takaw paladaŋ lɨl apan anɨb ak, takaw jɨj ne taydɨl mɨdeb agɨlak?

8.10 Ais 6.9-10, Mak 4.12 Agel Jisas kɨlop agak, God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab ak, takaw we gɨl mɨdolɨgup ak nɨbop gos ñek nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak. Pen binɨb yokɨp okok, kɨli nɨgɨnɨgabal ak pen, anɨb agup agɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgabal agak. Kɨli takaw paladaŋ lup ak nɨgɨnɨgabal ak pen, takaw jɨj ak ma nɨgɨnɨgabal agak.
Pen takaw paladaŋ lɨl tap mɨdup tek apin ak, God takaw ak apin agak.

Mɨdup ogɨnap yownɨgab kanɨb nab ak apin ak, binɨb okok God takaw ak nɨgɨnɨg gɨlak agɨl apin agak. Gel, Satan apɨl takaw anɨb ak dɨ we gek, kɨli God nop gos ma lɨnɨgel, God kɨlop ma dɨnɨgab agɨl apin agak.

Pen mɨdup ogɨnap yownɨgab kab adek lum sɨkol yek okok apin ak, God takaw ak nɨŋɨd, tep gaknɨŋ nop gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgabal ak pen, kɨdɨl am wos ma gɨnɨgab tek gos kɨles yɨbɨl gɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgabal agɨl apin agak. Kɨdek mɨŋel ogɨnap apek nop kelɨgɨnɨgabal agɨl apin agak.

Pen mɨdup ogɨnap yownɨgab nag ñuñu nab okok apin ak, binɨb okok God takaw ak nɨgɨnɨgabal ak pen, kɨdek takaw mɨŋel akaŋ, kubap mani tap okok akaŋ, mɨñmɨñ gep adek ak nep gos nɨŋɨd, God nop gos kɨles gɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgabal agɨl apin agak.

Pen mɨdup ogɨnap lum teplep yɨbɨl sɨŋak yapɨl, jak tep gɨl mɨdup kuŋay yɨbɨl nep pulɨnɨgab apin ak, binɨb okok God takaw ak nɨŋɨd dɨ wos yɨbɨl gɨl, mɨdtep yɨbɨl gɨl gɨtep gel binɨb yad kuŋay yɨbɨl tɨkjakɨnɨgabal agɨl apin agak.

Pen binɨb okok sup dagɨlɨl, tin mɨgan okok akaŋ, bog adek kɨnɨbal muk okok ma lɨpal agak. Mɨlek gek binɨb nɨgɨlaŋ agɨl, abañ adek sɨŋalaŋ nep lel nɨm, binɨb okok kal mɨgan apɨlɨg mɨlek anɨb ak nɨgɨnɨgabal agak.
8.17 Mat 10.26, Luk 12.2 Tap okok mɨdupsek we gɨl mɨdeb, sayn mɨseŋ lɨnɨgab agak. Bɨ tap okok mɨdupsek we gel mɨdeb, sayn mɨseŋ lek, binɨb nɨgɨnɨgabal agak.

8.18 Mat 13.12, 25.29, Luk 19.26 Anɨb ak takaw apin okok nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb agak. Binɨb takaw nɨŋɨd, nɨg dɨnɨgabal okok, takaw tep ogɨnap sek nɨgɨnɨgabal agak. Pen binɨb takaw nɨŋɨd ma nɨg dɨnɨgabal okok, sɨkol nɨgobun agɨl nepal ak sek pɨsnep kul gɨnɨgab agak.
Pen ñɨn anɨb ak, Jisas nonɨm nɨmam ne yɨbɨl okok kɨli Jisas nop nɨgɨnɨg apɨl nɨgɨlak, kal mɨgan anɨb ak tɨbɨk dɨl yek, kɨli seŋayaŋ yelak.
Binɨb ap yelak okok Jisas nop agɨlak, Nanɨm namam okok, nep nɨgɨnɨg ap mɨdebal seŋayaŋ agɨlak.
Agel Jisas kɨlop agak, Binɨb God takaw ne ak nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨpal okok, ami yad, mam yad okok mɨdebal agak.
Pen ñɨn olap Jisas bɨne okok kɨlop agak, Ñɨg cheb tɨkɨl kɨd adaŋ amnun agak. Agɨl, bot ak dɨl amnɨlak.
8.23 Mat 8.24, Mak 4.37 Nab okok amɨlɨg, Jisas ne wɨsɨn kɨn amnak won ak, yɨgen awl apɨl ñɨg nab anɨb ak dɨl, ñɨg pag bot mɨgan ak amek, kumnɨgel tek nep lak.
8.24 Mat 8.25, Mak 4.38 Anɨgek, bɨne okok ap Jisas nop kaskas gel tɨkjakek, agɨlak, Bɨawl. Chɨn mɨdupsek kumnɨgobun agɨlak.
Pen ne bɨne okok kɨlop agak, God nop gos lɨnepɨm tek, taynen nop agnɨgem tap gek anɨb ak ma kelɨgup agak?
Pen kɨli bot awl anɨb ak dɨl, ñɨg Galili cheb nab ak am am, man Gelasa binɨb yelak kɨd adaŋ amjakɨlak.

Amjakɨl, Jisas ne bot pɨdeg lum ayaŋ lɨl amnaknɨŋ, bɨ kɨcheki walɨjpal kuŋay yɨbɨl yek olap apjakak. Bɨ anɨb ak chɨb mɨgan mɨdup nep yolɨgup, kal yɨbɨl mɨgan ak ma kɨnolɨgup. Chɨp kamelɨgɨpal kab mɨgan okok nep kɨn ajolɨgup.

Bɨ nop kod mɨdep okok, nag kɨles tɨmel lɨl, ñɨn tob nop okok tunɨg wos gelɨgɨpal ak pen, kɨcheki tap okok kɨles gek nag lelɨgɨpal anɨb okok gek pugɨlɨkek, man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok mɨnek mɨnek amolɨgup. Pen bɨ anɨb ak, Jisas nop nɨŋɨd wal agɨl, apɨl Jisas yek tob agen sɨŋak apyap pakak. Jisas tap nop mulɨk sɨkak anɨb okok kɨlop agak, Bɨ anɨb awl nop kelɨgɨl seŋ amnɨm agak. Anɨb agaknɨŋ, tap nop mulɨk sɨkak anɨb okok, nebneb gel, takaw awl agɨl agak, Jisas. Nad God bɨawl adek alaŋ Ñɨne ak, yɨp tap gɨnɨgeban ak ma gɨnɨmɨn agak.
Agek Jisas agak, Yɨb nad tay agak. Agek agak, Yɨb yad ak Kuŋay Yɨbɨl agak. Kɨcheki walɨjpal okok kuŋay yɨbɨl mulɨk sɨkɨl yelak tek nɨm, anɨb agak.
8.31 Lep 9.11 Pen kɨcheki okok, Jisas nop takaw awl agɨl agɨlak, Chɨnop mab ke yɨneb kaw mɨgan kɨluŋ ma tɨkup ak ma agyokɨnɨmɨn agɨlak. Mel agɨlak.
Anɨb agɨl nɨgɨlak, chag kuŋay yɨbɨl amɨl gelak yep pɨl anɨb sɨŋak. Jisas nop agɨlak, Chɨnop age, am chag mɨdebal okdaŋ kɨlop mulɨk sɨkun agɨlak. Anɨb agel Jisas yaw agek,
bɨ yɨbɨl anop kelɨgɨl, am chag anɨb okok kɨlop mulɨk sɨkɨlak. Mulɨk sɨkel, chag okok pɨgju mɨduŋ ayaŋ amɨl, gɨdam ñɨg cheb nab ayaŋ pakɨl, ñɨg ñɨbɨl mɨdupsek kumɨlak.
Pen bɨ chag mukep okok, Jisas gak anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, kasek amɨl binɨb taun yelak kɨlop agñɨl, am man yokɨp okok yelak okok kɨlop agñɨl gɨlak.

Anɨgɨl agñelak, tap anɨb ak tay gek nɨŋɨd agebal agɨl, apɨl nɨgɨlak, bɨ kɨcheki mulɨk sɨkɨl yolɨgup ak bɨ yɨbɨl lɨl, chech yɨmɨl, gos nop ak pag yɨkek, Jisas tob agen sɨŋak besɨg yek, nɨŋɨd pɨlɨkɨlak.
Pen binɨb nɨg mɨdel Jisas kɨcheki ag seŋ yokak okok, binɨb kɨdek owlak okok kɨlop ne anɨb anɨb gup agɨl agñɨlak.
Pen Gelasa binɨb mɨdupsek kɨlop jel gek pɨlɨkɨl, Jisas nop agɨlak, Nad adɨkɨd amnoŋ agɨlak. Agel, bot dɨl amnɨg gaknɨŋ, bɨ kɨcheki
mulɨk sɨkɨl yek Jisas gek bɨ yɨbɨl lak ak, ne Jisas nop takaw kɨles tɨmel agɨl agak, Yad nad ayɨp amobul agak. Anɨb agak ak pen Jisas nop agak, Mel.
God nep tɨtay gup tek, am binɨb nad okok kɨlop agñɨnɨmɨn agak. Agek, ne adɨkɨd amɨl, binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop Jisas yɨp anɨb anɨb gup agɨl agñak.
Pen binɨb Jisas apeb agɨl kod yelak okok, Jisas bot dɨl amjakek nɨŋɨd agɨlak, Tep apeban agɨlak.
8.41 Mat 9.18, Mak 5.22 Pen bɨ olap owak, yɨb ne Jaylus. Ne Juda apnan gɨpal kal ak bɨawl kod yolɨgup olap. Ne Jisas yek sɨŋak apɨl, kɨgom yɨmɨl agak, Kal yad amnul agak.
Pay yad nokom ak kumnɨgeb agak. Pay anɨb ak sub ne yɨn lak umɨgan ak agak.

8.43-44 Mat 9.20, Mak 5.28 Pen bin olap, bin kanɨb padɨkaknɨŋ yek, sap yeb anep umɨgan amnak. Bin anɨb ak nop gel suŋ lɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lak. Ne Jisas amek kud okok apɨl, chech palawl lak ak bad gol okok dɨnɨgaknɨŋ, nop suŋ lak.8.43-44 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap kɨli apal, Takaw anɨb ak won olap mɨdeb apal. Takaw nɨm ak anɨgɨl agak, Bin anɨb ak, dokta okok yɨp gel suŋ laŋ agɨl kɨlop mani ne mɨdupsek ñolɨgup agak.
Pen Jisas kɨlop agak, An yɨp dɨnɨgup agak? Agek, binɨb okok agɨlak, Chɨn ma dɨpun agɨlak. Pen Pita agak, Bɨawl. Binɨb kuŋay nep opal okok nep chɨlok ñel, gos nɨŋɨd ageban tek lup agak.
Agek Jisas agak, Binɨb nokom olap yɨp dɨnɨgek, kɨles yad ak amek, nɨŋɨd agebin agak.

Pen bin Jisas nop dɨnɨgak anɨb ak nɨgak, we gɨnɨmuŋ tek ma yek. Jep dɨlɨg, Jisas yek wulep sɨŋak apɨl kɨgom yɨmɨl, binɨb okok nɨg yelaknɨŋ agak, Nɨkɨm yɨp mɨnek mɨnek yowup ak, nep dɨnɨgen kasek pɨsnep yɨbɨl suŋ lup agak.
8.48 Luk 7.50 Agek Jisas agak, Pay yad, nad gos sek yenɨmɨn agak. Yɨp gos lɨnepan tek, nep gek suŋ lup nen, amɨl mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨn agak.
Anɨb agaknɨŋ, Jaylus bɨne olap kal ne nɨb apɨl nop agak, Pay nak pɨsnep kumub agak. Tisa nop age, tob yul ma ownɨmuŋ agak. Age adɨkɨd amnɨmuŋ agak.
Agek, Jisas takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, Jaylus nop agak, Pay yad ak kumeb agɨl gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Yɨp gos lɨnɨge, tɨkjakɨnɨgab agak.
Anɨb agɨl kal ak amjakɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop mɨdupsek ag seŋayaŋ mɨdɨl, pay nonɨm nap omɨŋal ak, Pita ak, Jon ak, Jemis ak, kɨlop poŋɨd pay anɨb ak nɨgɨnɨg kal mɨgan ayaŋ amnak.
8.52 Luk 7.13, Jon 11.11-13 Pen pay ak kumeb agɨl binɨb chaŋ lɨ yelak okok, Jisas kɨlop agak, Chaŋ ma lɨnɨmɨb agak. Pay anɨb awl ma kumub, yokɨp wɨsɨn kɨneb agak.
Anɨb agek, nop yɨmel agɨl agɨlak, Pay pɨsnep kumub ak, taynen anɨb agup agɨlak.
8.54 Luk 7.14, Jon 11.43 Pen Jisas pay kumak anɨb ak, ñɨn kɨd nop ak dɨl agak, Pay, tɨkjakan agak.
Anɨb agaknɨŋ, kawnan ne ak tep ap tol gek tɨkjakak. Tɨkjakek, Jisas nonɨm nap kɨlop agak, Tap ogɨnap ñel ñɨŋaŋ agak.
8.56 Mak 7.36, Luk 5.14 Tap anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, nonɨm nap kɨli judɨlek. Judɨl, Jisas kɨlop bel takaw kɨles gɨl agak, Binɨb okok kɨlop takaw anɨb ak ma yɨbɨl agɨnɨmil agak.
